attributes.action: Bring Forward Capacity Improvements at the London Bridge Bottleneck to ensure that Rail Services are not disrupted all of the time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London Bridge Bottleneck, from as many as 4 lines down to just two, aswell as First Capital Connect joining the equation, is causing our railway services in and out of Charing Cross and Cannon Street to be disrupted in and out of Peak, so the situation MUST be improved, or it will just get worse

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
